Ruby.en: Carvanha's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.

Sapphire.en: If anything invades Carvanha's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.

Emerald.en: Carvanha attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pokémon, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.

FireRed.en: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

LeafGreen.en: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

Diamond.en: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

Pearl.en: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

Platinum.en: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

HeartGold.en: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.

X.en: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.

Omega Ruby.en: Carvanha’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.

Alpha Sapphire.en: If anything invades Carvanha’s territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.

Sun.en: Each school has its own territory. Any intruders are mercilessly attacked with fangs bared.

Moon.en: If they scent the faintest trace of blood, they rush to attack en masse. When alone, they're rather cowardly.
